data.title: Changed my debit card on National Lottery and now it won't let me add funds; is this a security issue?
data.text:
Avoid support scams. We will never ask you to call or text a phone number or share personal information. Please report suspicious activity using the ‚ÄúReport Abuse‚Äù option.

Changed my debit card on National Lottery and now it won't let me add funds; is this a security issue?

1 reply

1 has this problem

1 view

Last reply by WestEnd

more options

Quote

Previous credit card out of date, updated details to new one and now National Lottery won't let me add funds online. Page just hangs. Same issue using Internet Explorer but that won't even let me log in!

Previous credit card out of date, updated details to new one and now National Lottery won't let me add funds online. Page just hangs. Same issue using Internet Explorer but that won't even let me log in!

Chosen solution

That wouldn't be either probelm from IE or FF Browser issue but the site issue itself you need to contact them about it.
